title: Circle Area Explorer
description: An interactive educational simulation that demonstrates the quadratic relationship between a circle's radius and its area using the formula A = πr². Students can manipulate the radius using a slider or by directly dragging within the circle, with an optional graph showing the quadratic growth curve.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: geometry
circles
area
quadratic relationships
pi
radius
mathematics
interactive simulation
learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of circle area explorer
Explore circle area explorer through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of circle area explorer to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on circle area explorer
